另外還有飛鏢和日本卡拉OK，是一個可以以合理的價格享受樂趣的女孩酒吧。

新增時間：2023.2.21
在科羅納之後，我三年來第一次來到這家商店。
以前駐紮的日本人很多，現在顧客一半是台灣人，一半是日本人。

雖然媽媽和姊姊都在酒吧，但我很感激她們照顧我、陪伴我😊

我衷心感謝您讓這些美好的商店繼續存在而沒有消失💐
EN:
There are also darts and Japanese karaoke, which is a girl bar that can enjoy fun at a reasonable price.
The Nan's mother here is very good, and it will not be embarrassing to take her to the entertainment venue.
You can also drink shochu and sake, which is great.
I often go to this place because I can buy rare shochu from the offshore winery famous for whales and sea.

New time: 2023.2.21
After Colona, ​​I came to this store for the first time in three years.
There were many Japanese people stationed before, and now half of the customers are Taiwanese and half of them are Japanese.

Although my mother and sister are in a bar, I am grateful for them to take care of me and accompany me.

I sincerely thank you for letting these beautiful stores continue to exist without disappearing.
